title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter
content: Directed by Steven Bognar and Julia Reichert, ¡°American Factory¡± explores the cultural and political complications that emerge when Cao Dewang, a Chinese billionaire, opens an auto-glass factory in a shuttered General Motors plant near Dayton, Ohio.

title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter

title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter

title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter
content: For Wang, who was born in China and now lives in New York, the story could not be more personal.

title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter
content: At once an insistently feminist memoir and a far-reaching social critique, ¡°One Child Nation¡± follows Wang as she returns to China with her infant son.

title: Sundance Documentaries Expose Truths, Both Glorious and Bitter
content: There, she begins exploring the one-child policy, speaking with family members and neighbors, as well as former workers who performed forced sterilizations, abortions and labor induction for China¡¯s family-planning program.

content: BEIJING <U+2014> A senior Chinese trade official called on Saturday for a compromise between the United States and China that could make a trade deal easier to reach this spring.

title: China Suggests a Trade Compromise With the Trump Administration
content: Over the past year, the most contentious issue in the countries¡¯ trade talks has been the Trump administration¡¯s demand for what it calls an enforcement provision, which would allow the United States to monitor China¡¯s behavior and put penalties in place if the Chinese violated the deal.

title: China Suggests a Trade Compromise With the Trump Administration
content: The Trump administration has pressed China to accept an agreement allowing the United States to unilaterally reimpose tariffs if it concludes that China has not gone through with structural changes to its economy.

title: China Suggests a Trade Compromise With the Trump Administration
content: In the past month, the administration has also pushed for a broader enforcement mechanism, which would include the right to reimpose tariffs for any category of goods in which imports from China surge.

content: But China¡¯s brutal campaign to strip Uighur and other Turkic minorities in the Xinjiang region of their culture, religion and identity through a network of secretive re-education camps must rank among the more outrageous continuing violations in the world.

content: What makes it all the more galling is the Beijing government¡¯s feigned umbrage whenever the camps are mentioned, and its absurd efforts to depict them as China¡¯s contribution to the war on terrorism.

title: China¡¯s Brutal ¡®Boarding Schools¡¯

title: China¡¯s Brutal ¡®Boarding Schools¡¯

title: Bus Fire in China Kills Dozens of People

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: One camp holds that the United States erred by coddling China and Russia, and urges a new competition against these great power rivals.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Trump has consistently criticized American leaders for being too weak and too generous toward other countries, and none more than China.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: When he began his campaign in 2015, he decried China as a ¡°bigger problem¡± than the Islamic State, denouncing Beijing¡¯s trade practices alongside its military buildup.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: In this view, the United States emerged from the Cold War with naive hopes: It welcomed China into the World Trade Organization and Russia into the G-20 and expected them to liberalize their societies and conform to an American-led ¡°world order.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: ¡± Instead, China and Russia became more authoritarian and more assertive, shaping global politics against America¡¯s wishes.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: The Trump administration has led the way in confronting China, an agenda that transcends its internal fissures.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: ¡± The administration increasingly treats China¡¯s economic actions as national security threats.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: In the past several months, the United States has pushed its allies to block the Chinese tech giant Huawei from participating in their 5G wireless networks on the grounds that the Chinese state could use the company to conduct espionage.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: This move may mark a pivot toward the economic containment of China, with core North Atlantic and East Asian alliances of the Cold War reconstituted in opposition to Chinese economic and political power.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Pressuring China is one of Mr.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Elizabeth Warren, eyeing 2020, accuses Russia and China of ¡°working flat out to remake the global order¡± in their authoritarian image.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: The Brookings Institution¡¯s Thomas Wright, for example, now writes off the Russo-Chinese ¡°neo-authoritarian world,¡± urging America to lead the ¡°free world¡± against it.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: The message is not far from that of Vice President Mike Pence, who in October blasted China as a crypto-totalitarian force committing aggression wherever it goes, even when it finances infrastructure in poor countries.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Despite the rhetoric, the most basic aims of great power competition remain to be defined, especially toward a rising China.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Does the United States seek merely to modify Chinese conduct, or to block China¡¯s ascent outright?

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: How much economic separation from China do national security concerns warrant?

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Warren, for example, denounces Chinese and Russian behavior at the same time that she promises to remove troops from Afghanistan and ¡°cut our bloated defense budget.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: Advocates of great power competition, after all, will hardly accept cutting military spending even if all they seek is to maintain current levels of superiority over a rising China and an assertive Russia.

title: A Clash Is Coming Over America¡¯s Place in the World
content: To avoid being outflanked, they ought to amplify the potential for cooperation with China, a power that has successfully practiced its own form of restraint, refraining from war for the past 40 years.

title: Donald Trump, Tragic Hero
content: Trump took office at a time when the early promise of globalization had foundered; when the purpose of the American alliance system was in doubt; when glowing projections of liberal democracy in Russia and China had proved dead wrong; and when America was mired in unwinnable wars.

title: Donald Trump, Tragic Hero
content: His language was brutal, crude and sometimes racist or xenophobic, but in contrast to some of his opponents, he acknowledged the loss of more than two million manufacturing jobs to Chinese competition, the propensity of American companies to move abroad in search of lower wages and the continued difficulty of policing the country¡¯s southern border.
